title: Academic Vocabulary
description: Prepare for university or professional environments by mastering formal English vocabulary.
info:
Course Info

Academic English requires a specific set of vocabulary. This course focuses on transition words and formal alternatives to common phrasal verbs to elevate your writing and speaking.

quiz.question: Which is a formal alternative to 'But'?
quiz.correctFeedback: Correct! 'However' is a standard formal transition for contrast.
